articles.author: Dan Lamothe
articles.title: Pentagon orders aircraft carrier to Latin America as Trump signals escalation - The Washington Post
articles.description: A spokesman said the dramatic increase in combat power aims to “disrupt narcotics trafficking” and “degrade and dismantle” criminal groups operating in the region.
articles.content: The Pentagon on Friday signaled a major expansion of its military campaign against Transnational Criminal Organizations in Latin America, saying Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has ordered the aircraf… [+85 chars]
